verbs.description: [ARG0: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell] [V: joined] [ARG1: the calls of his congressional colleagues] [ARGM-PRP: in asking President Donald Trump to reconsider a fresh round of tariffs levied against US allies in Mexico , Canada and the European Union] .
